name: RTDS – Verein zur Förderung der Kommunikation und Vermittlung von Forschung, Technologie und Innovation
goal: RTDS Association (RTDS) is a non-profit SME supporting implementation of EU research & innovation projects to optimise use of the results to maximise impact. RTDS provides professional management of dissemination, communication and exploitation (DEC) in a range of areas: food, nutrition and agriculture, forestry and associated processing technologies, manufacturing but also renewable energy, transport and related social sciences.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: H2020 proposals, project implementation and post project exploitation planning to increase impact from results
